document_data.mainbody:
Sossar Bay, which was also referred to as Sosser Bay, was a small bay found in northeast Faer√ªn.
Sossar Bay was located on the eastern shore of Sossal in the Cold Lands. The bay was a small extension of Yal Tengri, the Great Ice Sea.
Naupau, one of Sossals few trading settlements, was located along Sossar Bay.
